title: 174.20 PAVEMENT SELECTION GUIDELINES.
text:
(a) The commissioner must develop, implement, and adhere to a pavement investment guide.
(b) The commissioner must review and approve all pavement selections made by district offices for construction, reconstruction, rehabilitation, or preservation projects to ensure that the pavement selection is consistent with the pavement investment guide. Nothing in this section allows the commissioner to alter projects selected by district offices, except for the type of pavement to be used.
